attributes.description: This dashboard provides topic-level visibility into traffic, partition health, and log storage metrics.

params.markdown:
### Topics

This dashboard provides visibility into Kafka topic-level traffic, partition health, and storage metrics.

- Tracks topic traffic, including incoming and outgoing bytes and message rates.
- Provides insight into throughput, request patterns, and rejected data rates.
- Monitors replication status with under-replicated partitions and ISR thresholds.
- Surfaces log storage details such as total log size and segment counts.
- Includes offset range metrics to show partition boundaries and data distribution.
